org.zkoss.zksandbox

Class SimpleThemeProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zkoss.zksandbox.SimpleThemeProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.zkoss.zk.ui.util.ThemeProvider

    public class SimpleThemeProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.zkoss.zk.ui.util.ThemeProvider
    A simple theme provider. It provides the theme for zksandbox. This class demostrates a simple use that manipulates the font size by setting the execution's attribute directly. Thus, it cannot be cached by the client. On the other hand, is another example that manipulates the URI for different font size such that the client can cache the result.
